Interface HeyzapAds.OnStatusListener

Enclosing class:
HeyzapAds
public static interface HeyzapAds.OnStatusListener

Method Summary
 void onAvailable(java.lang.String tag)
          Called when an ad has been successfully fetched and is available to show.
 void onClick(java.lang.String tag)
          Call when an ad is clicked on by the user.

          Called when an ad could not be fetched from the ad server.

          Called when an ad failed to be shown.

Method Detail

onShow

void onShow(java.lang.String tag)
Called when an ad is shown to the user.

Parameters:
tag - The tag associated with the ad.

onClick

void onClick(java.lang.String tag)
Call when an ad is clicked on by the user. Expect the application to go into the background shortly after this callback is fired.

Parameters:
tag - The tag associated with the ad.

onHide

void onHide(java.lang.String tag)
Called when an ad has been hidden.

Parameters:
tag - The tag associated with the ad.

onFailedToShow

void onFailedToShow(java.lang.String tag)
Called when an ad failed to be shown. This can be due to a variety of reasons, such as an internal error in Heyzap or no internet connection. May be called in connection with onFailedToFetch(String) .

Parameters:
tag - The tag associated with the ad.

onAvailable

void onAvailable(java.lang.String tag)
Called when an ad has been successfully fetched and is available to show.

Parameters:
tag - The tag associated with the ad.

onFailedToFetch

void onFailedToFetch(java.lang.String tag)
Called when an ad could not be fetched from the ad server. This could be for a variety of reasons, such as poor internet connectivity, the ad server choosing not to fill the ad, or a tag being disabled.

Parameters:
tag - The tag associated with the ad.
